NCBSinfo is an application for regular use, especially helpful for people working at the National Centre for Biological Science (NCBS), Bangalore. Our aim is to create a mobile application, which will serve as an application-cum-database for important information pertaining to NCBS. With the help of this, we will try to reduce the time spent on searching for shuttle timings and contact numbers.

This is NOT an official NCBS app and has been created ONLY for personal use. All the information provided in this application was last updated on December 30, 2017. Though a lot of effort has been taken to curate the information, minor discrepancies may still exist. Developers are not responsible for any such information presented/conveyed through this application. In case of any bug/error(s), please report it to the developers; measures will be taken to rectify the same.

• Some of components of the UI look weird

This application is not yet designed for all screen sizes. Hence UI components might appear distorted or misplaced.



• I am not being able to receive any event notifications

Please check if you have any task manager application that might be killing the NCBSinfo app. In that case, add this app to the white-list.



• There is no information in the event section

This can happen if there are no events retrieved from the server. The app will send request to data server depending on your network settings and will retrieve the data. If you want to manually sync the app, go to the developer\'s options and click on \"Sync Data now\".

Best part of an open source app is that you will know exactly what is going on inside the app. We encourage you to check our source code on GitHub ( https://github.com/NCBSinfo/NCBSinfo ). Code is heavily commented for readability. We ask for following permissions from you

Google and Firebase analytics

We receive some anonymous statistics from all users who have installed this app. This information generally includes Android Version, Default language, Country, App version, Uninstall count etc. See Google privacy policies regarding this.



Crash Report

This will send us anonymous crash reports (if any) which we use to fix bugs and make the app better :)

We are very grateful to all the feedback and encouragement given by you. We would also like to acknowledge all the beta testers of this app. Special thanks to Pritha Ghosh for helping us out with grammar and spelling checks. All graphics inside the app was created by Rohit Suratekar. Icons were borrowed from Google Material Design as well as IBM design language resources.

We have used the following Open Source Android libraries while making this app and are very thankful to them.



• Design Library by Google

See our source code for detailed library information.

In continuation with our previous announcement regarding halting further development, we will be generating long term support (LTS) version of current app. For this purpose, we will be removing all cloud related functions. Now all app functions will be offline. Authentication steps will be discarded i.e. you can no longer create account or login to your existing account. All user data will be deleted in future. If you want to access any of your past data related to synced routes, please contact contact@secretbiology.com. All user data and backups will be kept till 1 Feb 2019.
